text: <!channel>: In the embedded vimeo videos on the landing page - there is copy in the top left of each video...   Can somebody get me something official for that?    It's currently "Name's wish list"  and "from Meijer Thingatron"
Also - both of those things are optional...  I can simply hide one or both of them
Can I stop by and see what you're referring to?
This is their App identity (and favicon): <https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.meijer.mobile.meijer>

attachments.text: Streamline your shopping with the Meijer Mobile App. Find products, make a list, get savings, and much more. It’s everything you need for your shopping trip, in the pa...
attachments.fallback: Streamline your shopping with the Meijer Mobile App. Find products, make a list, get savings, and much more. It’s everything you need for your shopping trip, in the pa...

text: I think that would work nicely for us, no?
Is red on white no bueno?
given the rest of the page is so monochromatic in the blue spectrum, I would personally vote no bueno, but that's me.
I'd rather just continue to leave it off...
No problem.  It's extra credit anyway.  Let's just stick with the user's name and wish list (which is in fact two words)
there's lots of copy with it one word.
actually maybe there is not lots.   just one or two.
